mapper.select: SELECT admin_id adminId, admin_pw adminPw FROM admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND admin_pw = PASSWORD(#{adminPw})
SELECT qna_no qnaNo, qna_title qnaTitle, qna_type qnaType, qna_date qnaDate FROM qna ORDER BY qna_type
SELECT member_id memberId, member_name memberName, member_addr memberAddr, member_phone memberPhone, member_email memberEmail FROM member ORDER BY member_name DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_pw = 0, member_name = 0, member_addr = 0, member_phone = 0, member_email = 0, member_pic = 0 WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
